subject: TOOLS-1983 How to avoid hard failure of most builds on Feb 22 from GitHub weak crypto removal (registrar) Reviewed by: Julien Gilli <julien.gilli@joyent.com> Approved by: Julien Gilli <julien.gilli@joyent.com> Approved by: Josh Wilsdon <josh@wilsdon.ca>
commitMessage:
TOOLS-1983 How to avoid hard failure of most builds on Feb 22 from GitHub weak crypto removal (registrar)
Reviewed by: Julien Gilli <julien.gilli@joyent.com>
Approved by: Julien Gilli <julien.gilli@joyent.com>
Approved by: Josh Wilsdon <josh@wilsdon.ca>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

New commits:
    
    commit 191bbdbdfb0775294adc4b334450a2d273cd1811
    
    first crack
Uploaded patch set 2: Commit message was updated.

Patch Set 1: CI-Testing+1

"make check" passed ok

Patch Set 2: CI-Testing+1

"make check" passed ok

Patch Set 2:

Testing notes:

Downloaded the registrar tarball generated by this build: https://jenkins.joyent.us/job/registrar/444/ from Joyent_Dev/public/builds/registrar/grr-TOOLS-1983-20180223T013701Z/registrar/registrar-pkg-grr-TOOLS-1983-20180223T013701Z-g191bbdb.tar.bz2.

Copied it to my COAL environment, untarred it with:

tar xfvj /var/tmp/registrar-TOOLS-1983.bz2 -C /zones/$(vmadm lookup -1 alias=ufds0)/

Then zlogined into the ufds0 zone, verified that registrar was using the new node version (v0.10.48 instead of v0.10.26):

[root@d926a653-917a-4f94-a7d7-f6815ffcf20a (coal:ufds0) ~]# /opt/smartdc/registrar/build/node/bin/node --version
v0.10.48
[root@d926a653-917a-4f94-a7d7-f6815ffcf20a (coal:ufds0) ~]#

Then verified that ufds.coal.joyent.us was in binder:

[root@headnode (coal) ~]# dig ufds.coal.joyent.us

; <<>> DiG 9.10.1-P1 <<>> ufds.coal.joyent.us
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27062
;; flags: qr rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1
;; WARNING: recursion requested but not available

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 1470
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ufds.coal.joyent.us.           IN      A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
ufds.coal.joyent.us.    60      IN      A       10.99.99.18

;; Query time: 0 msec
;; SERVER: 10.99.99.11#53(10.99.99.11)
;; WHEN: Fri Feb 23 20:20:00 UTC 2018
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 64

[root@headnode (coal) ~]#

Then disabled the registrar service in the ufds zone with svcadm disable registrar. Waited for ufds.coal.joyent.us to not be in binder anymore:

[root@headnode (coal) ~]# dig ufds.coal.joyent.us

; <<>> DiG 9.10.1-P1 <<>> ufds.coal.joyent.us
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35072
;; flags: qr rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1
;; WARNING: recursion requested but not available

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 1470
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ufds.coal.joyent.us.           IN      A

;; Query time: 0 msec
;; SERVER: 10.99.99.11#53(10.99.99.11)
;; WHEN: Fri Feb 23 20:20:41 UTC 2018
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 48

[root@headnode (coal) ~]#

Finally re-enabled the registrar service and verified that ufds.coal.joyent.us was back in binder:

[root@headnode (coal) ~]# dig ufds.coal.joyent.us

; <<>> DiG 9.10.1-P1 <<>> ufds.coal.joyent.us
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21236
;; flags: qr rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1
;; WARNING: recursion requested but not available

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 1470
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ufds.coal.joyent.us.           IN      A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
ufds.coal.joyent.us.    60      IN      A       10.99.99.18

;; Query time: 0 msec
;; SERVER: 10.99.99.11#53(10.99.99.11)
;; WHEN: Fri Feb 23 20:20:55 UTC 2018
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 64

[root@headnode (coal) ~]#

Patch Set 2: Integration-Approval+1

This seems ok to me.
Patch Set 3: Commit message was updated.
Change has been successfully merged by Julien Gilli
